mapper.select: SELECT POPUP_KEY, NAME, WIDTH, HEIGHT, X as LEFT, Y as TOP, START_DATE, END_DATE, IS_SHOW FROM T_POPUP ORDER BY POPUP_KEY DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY
SELECT A.LINK_KEY, B.NAME as GoodsName FROM T_LINK_KEY A INNER JOIN T_CATEGORY B ON A.REQ_KEY = B.CTG_KEY WHERE A.REQ_TYPE = 100 AND A.RES_KEY = #{popupKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_POPUP SET IS_SHOW = #{isShow} WHERE POPUP_KEY = #{popupKey}
